sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.RMTaskActualDates</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>RMTaskActualDates</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var RMTaskActualDates = Class.create();
RMTaskActualDates.prototype = {
    initialize: function(task) {
		this.task = task;
    },
	
	sendSuccess: function(asd, aed , ad) {
		var payload = {};
		payload.actual_start_date = asd;
		payload.actual_end_date = aed;
		payload.actual_duration = ad;
		payload.status = 'success';
		return payload;
	},
	
	deriveWIPDates: function() {
		if ( this.isActualStartDateGiven() ) 
			return this.sendSuccess(this.task.actual_start_date, "" ,"");
		else
			return this.sendSuccess(this.task.planned_start_date, "","");
	},
	
	
	isActualStartDateGiven: function() {
		return JSUtil.notNil(this.task.actual_start_date);
	},
	
    type: 'RMTaskActualDates'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-10-12 08:44:32</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>92f68dbd533710103ad4ddeeff7b1252</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>RMTaskActualDates</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Release Management" source="com.snc.release_management_v2">4e159f242fc10110d8a4d5f62799b628</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_92f68dbd533710103ad4ddeeff7b1252</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-10-12 09:16:49</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>692</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
